meanings.definition: A group of three similar or identical molecules or subunits.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the trimers under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: The recipe called for combining three trimers of ingredients.
meanings.sent3: The trimers of colors in the painting created a harmonious blend.
meanings.sent4: The trimers of dancers moved in perfect synchronization on stage.
meanings.sent5: The trimers of stars in the sky formed a beautiful constellation.

meanings.definition: A polymer consisting of three monomer units.
meanings.sent1: The company developed a new type of trimers for industrial use.
meanings.sent2: The scientist explained how trimers are formed in chemical reactions.
meanings.sent3: The trimers of plastic were molded into a unique shape.
meanings.sent4: The trimers of letters formed a complex word puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The trimers of music notes created a catchy melody.

meanings.definition: A protein complex composed of three subunits.
meanings.sent1: The trimers in the cell play a crucial role in metabolism.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained the function of trimers in the body.
meanings.sent3: The trimers of enzymes worked together to break down the food.
meanings.sent4: The trimers of antibodies fought off the infection effectively.
meanings.sent5: The trimers of DNA formed a stable genetic structure.
